string.text: He has no less than eight ships lashed together. They mount four heavy mangonels - big ones. Most ships would tip over from the recoil if they weren't chained to each other.
One is on the roundship, which is the fortress's keep, as it were.
Also, keep moving. One or two hits could shatter our timbers or set us alight and make an end of us.
Another three are on cogs - one is to the northwest.
You must steer the Wasp to take out those mangonels. You need direct hits - but don’t get too close, as their decks are packed with archers.
We're right behind you, brother. Let's take this vile toad of a merchant down!
The others are to the northeast and southeast.
Have a good look at Crusas's floating fortress before we attack. It's formidable, but it's not going anywhere.
